title:

descriptions:
Title: oannao Pink Silicone Kitchen Utensil Set with Wooden Handles - 446°F Heat Resistant, Non-Stick Cookware Safe, 14-Piece

Description: Elevate your cooking experience with the oannao Pink Silicone Kitchen Utensil Set, crafted for discerning home chefs who demand the best in functionality and style. This 14-piece set features BPA-free, food-grade silicone tools that are odorless and safe for all your culinary creations, ensuring no reaction with foods or beverages.

Key Features:

- Heat Resilience: Designed to endure up to 446°F, these utensils stand up to the demands of any cooking environment without melting or emitting smoke.
- Ergonomic Wooden Handles: Enjoy a comfortable grip that stays cool to the touch, protecting your hands from heat while offering control and durability.
- Comprehensive Set: Equipped with an array of utensils including a Deep Soup Ladle, Slotted Turner, Pasta Server, and more, this set meets all your kitchen needs without the need for additional purchases.
- One-Piece Design: The seamless construction with a stainless steel core means no food traps, making these utensils simple to clean and maintain (hand wash recommended).
- Non-Scratch: Perfect for non-stick surfaces, these silicone utensils protect your cookware from scratches and damage.

Included in Set:

- Deep Soup Ladle
- Solid Serving Spoon
- Slotted Spoon
- Slotted Turner
- Turner
- Food Tongs
- Pasta Server
- Flexible Spatula
- Basting Brush
- Whisk
- Round Spatula Turner
- Large Skimmer Spoon
- Small Silicone Spatula
- Utensil Holder

Please note: Initial use requires soaking for half an hour and airing for around 3 hours to remove the residual silicone smell. With their stylish design and practicality, these pink utensils not only enhance your kitchen decor but also make a thoughtful gift for loved ones.

Customer Support: Our dedicated team is ready to assist you with any questions or concerns, with a promise of a swift response within 12 hours. Experience the oannao difference and enjoy a kitchen upgrade that marries elegance with efficiency.

Title: oannao Pink Silicone Kitchen Utensils Set with Wooden Handles - 14-Piece, Heat Resistant up to 446°F, Nonstick Cookware Safe

Description: Elevate your cooking experience with the oannao Pink Silicone Kitchen Utensils Set, expertly crafted to combine durability, style, and functionality. This comprehensive 14-piece set is designed to withstand temperatures up to 446°F, ensuring that it stands up to the heat of any culinary challenge without melting or producing harmful fumes.

Crafted from premium, BPA-free food-grade silicone, these utensils are not only safe and odorless but also gentle on your nonstick cookware, protecting it from scratches. The solid construction features a stainless steel core for long-lasting use without warping. Each utensil boasts a seamless one-piece design, eliminating food traps and making cleanup a breeze. However, due to the elegant wooden handles, we recommend hand washing to maintain their smooth finish and integrity.

The ergonomically designed wooden handles offer a comfortable grip, keeping your hands cool by preventing heat transfer. This set includes a variety of kitchen essentials such as a deep soup ladle, slotted spoons, turners, a pasta server, and more, all housed in a convenient utensil holder. Whether you're cooking, baking, or mixing, this set has you covered.

For added peace of mind, our responsive after-sales support is ready to address your queries within 12 hours. Make the oannao Silicone Kitchen Utensils Set a cherished addition to your kitchen or a perfect gift for the home chef in your life.

Note: To ensure the longevity of your set, avoid soaking wooden handles in water and using a dishwasher. Prior to the first use, soak utensils in water for half an hour and air them out for about 3 hours to eliminate the initial silicone smell.

Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.
